pageContext.claim: “Last week, the mayor of Oakland warned criminal aliens of a coming ICE enforcement action — giving them time to scatter and hide from authorities. The mayor’s conduct directly threatened the safety of federal immigration officers and the law-abiding Americans in her community.”
pageContext.analysis: On March 10, Trump devoted his weekly address to sanctuary cities and illegal immigration. He attacked the mayor of Oakland, Calif., for tipping off residents to a raid by ICE in Northern California. Trump blamed the mayor for endangering the community. But it's important to note that ICE never catches all of its targets during these types of raids, that not all of ICE's targets have a rap sheet, and that not all are violent.
